events.message: I received the wrong product and would like to request a refund because this item does not match what I ordered.
The system has classified this case under Refund due to the customer's request for money back on an incorrect order.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong product shipment.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I'll be happy to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and I have attached a photo that shows the wrong product clearly for your review.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and provide a prepaid label to return the incorrect item.
I appreciate the quick response and the refund offer. I will send back the wrong item as soon as I receive the return label.
Your refund has been processed, and the return label has been emailed to you. Thank you for your cooperation!
Just checking in to ensure you received the refund and everything is satisfactory with your case closure.
As you have confirmed receipt of your refund, we are now closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
Please take a moment to complete a quick survey to let us know about your experience with our refund process.
